name: Gedonia 2
description: Gedonia 2 is an online coop RPG, which allows up to 4 players to freely explore living open world and build absolutely unique characters. An expanded and improved sequel for RPG Gedonia.

name: Haddie's Pizzeria
description: Extremely realistic cooking simulator. The player has to work in an apartment in modern design, solving different tasks such as cooking pizzas via real-life recipes, meanwhile rethinking life’s transience, the futility of pleasure, and the inevitability of death.

name: Cats Hidden in Maple Hollow
description: Find 100 cats hiding in the cozy autumnal town of Maple Hollow in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game.

name: Angelstruck
description: Angelstruck is a 2D roguelite shooter where you demolish the forces of Heaven as you attempt to reach the pearly gates. Overcharge your holy rifle, and min-max your way into insane game-breaking builds. Unlock permanent capabilities and powerful screen-destroying weapons that feed on kills.

name: Sect-Machina
description: Sect-Machina is a fluid, atmospheric bug-themed metroidvania rendered in a vibrant 2D pixelated style, crafted with meticulous attention to detail in its combat, characters, environments, sound, and story.

name: Project: Sword Art
description: Project: Sword Art is a visually stunning, engaging and addictive match-3 game that combines spectacular anime-style artwork, addictive gameplay and an exciting fantasy world. Embark on this magical adventure, defeat seductive girls and amass the largest collection in your gallery.

name: OverRoot
description: A Sci-fi Action Side Scroller, where you control Root, a sophisticated malware created to bypass the defences of malfunctioning computer systems. Use each ability at your disposal to erase everything in your path, in this experience focused on challenging and fast paced combat.

name: New Arc Line
description: Take a stand in the eternal conflict between Arcane Magic and Steampunk Revolution and tip the uneasy balance between sorcery, elves, dwarves and mysterious monsters on one side and steampunk gadgets, zeppelins, and tesla guns on the other in this single-player, party-based, story-rich RPG.

name: Memoriapolis
description: From Antiquity to the Age of Enlightenment, imagine, build and manage a city capable of spanning almost 2,500 years of history. Transform your explorers' camp into a world-renowned Capital. But beware: Each age brings its own challenges!

name: LoneStar
description:
LoneStar is a strategic Roguelike spaceship combat game. As a bounty hunter, you will capture criminals scattered across the universe. Win the shockwave battle to gain bounty rewards and vacations. Find the treasures, customize your spaceship, unlock talents, defeat the felons and be a legend!

The Bounty Hunter Association is recruiting now! Abundant rewards await you!

name: Kaleidola
description: Kaleidola is a first-person action puzzle game with a kaleidoscope-inspired twist. Dive into the mind-bending world and unlock powers that transform objects, obstacles, and paths with the click of a button to overcome seemingly impossible dead-ends. Discover what your creativity can achieve.

name: It's Hot Pot Time!
description: Take on the Hot Pot Challenge together in co-op or online play for up to 8 players and strive to become the ultimate hot pot champion! Experience the realistic simulation of eating hot pot. Enjoy and relax in an immersive environment. Get your stove ready and savor every moment!

name: The Hunter's Journals: Return to Wight Chapel
description: The Crawling Horror is dead, but its legacy of madness lives on!

name: Shipping Manager
description: Create and manage your own shipping empire. Control every aspect from route creation to marketing to staff handling and beat other managers to top the leaderboards.

name: X-Plane 12: FSDesigns - Alliance Municipal Airport
description: Welcome to Alliance! Alliance Municipal Airport, just about 3 miles southeast of the town of Alliance is statistically known as the least used airport in mainland USA. It offers scheduled passenger flights from, and to Denver with Denver Air Connection on the Fairchild Metroliner

name: X-Plane 12: FSDesigns - Jacksonville International Airport
description: Jacksonville International Airport is a civil and military airport that serves as the primary gateway to Northeast Florida, being one of the busiest in the state. The airport was built in the mid-1960s to replace Imeson Field as Jacksonville’s main airport.

name: X-Plane 12: FSDesigns - Pensacola International Airport
description: Pensacola International Airport is a public use airport 3 nautical miles northeast of the central business district of Pensacola in Escambia County, Florida, United States.

description: Sin descripción

description: Get TMNT: Shredder’s Revenge and its Dimension Shellshock DLC in this bundle!

name: Theft Ride Legacy: Deluxe Edition
description:
Gear up for the ultimate treasure hunt on wheels!
Get ready for an adrenaline-packed adventure in "Theft Ride Legacy"!
Bundle includes "Extra Color Pack" !

name: Sailing Era: Edge of the World
description: In Sailing Era's DLC, World's End, you will be setting sail on a new adventure from Northern Europe! Raise your sails, fill your cargo hold, and crush the Hanseatic League's monopoly to expand your own trade route!

name: Nurtopu
description: It is a rabbit game for collecting 2d diamonds. 2d hyper casual platform game.

name: Storage Auction
description: Enter virtual storage unit auctions. Look inside when the door is raised and decide how high you will bid. Touch items and containers in your purchased rooms to empty them and hopefully find treasure instead of junk.

name: Club Boss
description:
Club Boss is an offline football management / soccer management simulation game, where you create your own football club and lead them to glory.
Build your own football club in Club Boss, the new fast-paced addictive football manager game. Enjoy the Football Chairman-like gameplay and the Football Manager style stats and details.
Start from the bottom of a domestic football league and develop, finance and negotiate your football club to the top of the football pyramid.

name: Pirate's Boom Boom
description: This visually striking & super-fun "Arcade" Shooter will challenge newcomers and pros alike! Join our heroes, Pirate and Crow on their tiny wooden boat to battle Ghost Ships, Kamikazes, Armadas and the most dangerous Fleets of the high seas!

name: Ollie's Arcade
description: Relive fond memories of your favorite classic arcade or electronic handheld games! A fun collection of retro-styled mini games that are both challenging and simple to play.

name: Nyan Cat: Candy Match
description: Nyan Cat: Candy Match takes your favourite switch and match game mechanics and nyans them up to an intergalactic level. Are you a candy enthusiast? We got you covered! Do you love cats? Good news: cats love you too! Fan of rainbows? We got 'em! Always wanted to be more Nyan? Look no further!

name: Cluck In Traffic: Cars Royale!
description: Avoid moving cars at all costs and collect as much food as possible. Watch out though, the cars begin slow but soon get faster.

name: DotQuest
description:
DotQuest is an epic tale of a brave man on a quest to save the world from Satan and his forces of evil. The game features a large number of items and skills, all there to aid you in the battle against Satan.
On your way you will be accompanied with a party allowing you to devise different strategies during combat. Each character levels up individually and so do his weapon skills the more he uses a specific weapon.
DotQuest is an old school 2D RPG (Role Playing Game).
Recent RPGs just focus on graphics and tend to be too complicated.
DotQuest tries to break from the majority of modern RPGs by being simple and easy to understand.

name: Cabal: Return of Action
description: Enter the epic world of Nevareth in Cabal: Return of Action, the highly anticipated mobile game from the creators of Cabal Online. With over 30 million players online and an MMORPG (Multi Massively Online Role Playing Game) lineage that spans more than 15 years, Cabal: Return of Action is one of the 3D RPG pioneers to feature fast-paced combo-driven combat in an immersive stylized MMO.

name: Swipe Link
description:
Swipe Link is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.
Strategically remove all linked blocks.

name: Joining Hands 2
description: Joining Hands 2 is intuitive and easy to play; drag and drop the Peablins so that everyone is holding hands. The level of challenge increases as the Peablins get more hands and new types of Peablins are introduced. Try to collect all the stars from each level too!

name: Burning Bubbles Lab
description: Classic bubble shooter game, reinterpreted for iOS. Comes with thousands of levels.

name: Anodia: Unique Brick Breaker
description: Play through over 150 handcrafted and unique levels, compete with your friends on Game Center leader boards, unlock over 30 achievements and simply have a lot of fun with Anodia.

name: Bar Oasis 2
description: Enjoy the continued story of Bar Oasis in the visual novel styled story mode as Vic returns from Hong Kong in pursuit of his love interest, only to find that Boss had left everything to a rookie girl and did a runner on the job and left the bar to a new girl, Carla. As Vic tries to undo the damages that the bar suffered during his absence, more people join the ranks of regulars at Bar Oasis.

name: Inertix
description:
A unique minimal puzzle that will satisfyingly tease your brain.
Play Inertix and embark on a timing puzzle journey filled with exquisite mechanics that will put your synchronization skills to the ultimate test! All while relaxing your senses.

name: Nodes of Yesod: 25th Anniversary Edition
description:
Welcome to the 25th Anniversary Edition of Nodes Of Yesod!
Guide Astro Charlie through various moon caverns, defeating many monsters on your way. Collect 8 Alchiems to complete your quest!!!
In this enhanced version of the classic 8-bit platform game, you will find the complete original game, along with an enhanced version containing new graphics, new gameplay features, new audio, music remixes, and more!

name: Ultimate Tennis
description:
Ultimate Tennis is the most complete mobile sport game ever! Enjoy thrilling gameplay, beautiful graphics and pack of action!
Ultimate Tennis offers you a tweaked version of the familiar finger-swipe tennis gameplay combined with a detailed element that gives you near to unlimited options for improving and customizing your character(s). To provide a more action-packed experience the tennis rules have been adjusted slightly, resulting in fast-paced gameplay and shorter but much more exciting matches!
On top of that the game offers great graphics and visualizations to give you one of the most visually realistic tennis experiences to date.

name: Date One Direction
description: Do you love One Direction? Have you ever dreamed of dating them? Well now you can! Start charming your favourite One Direction star today!

name: 1Dreamboy 2
description: 1Dreamboy 2 is a sequel to 1Dreamboy, an unofficial dating simulator based on the band One Direction.

name: Google Maps Snake
description: Navigate different cities around the world in this rendition of the classic arcade game Snake.

name: Bowave
description: An addictive game in which the player takes on the role of an elite archer who is tasked with protecting the tower from the onslaught of enemies.

name: Lost Puzzle: City
description: Lost Puzzle: City is a 3D puzzle game in which you will have to place some items from the list where they belong. Look for clues in the environment, scrutinize every street and don't forget: it's not as easy as it seems at first sight!

name: All in Pairs
description: A warehouse worker's day can't be boring. Every day things are scattered on the table in front of you.

name: Lost in Fantasy
description: Lost in fantasy - 2D platformer with RPG elements. You will go through different levels as you progress through the story of the game! Create your character, equip it with the necessary weapons and go to battle! Go to a wonderful world, explore it, and most importantly, beware of dangerous enemies!

name: Slum Musketeer
description: The game is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Go through many levels, find out what happened to the teacher. Overcome various traps, fight enemies with swords, and also destroy bosses! Find a way to bring it back!

name: Underground Gnome
description: Underground gnome - is a 2D platformer with puzzle elements. Destroy enemies on the location and complete the set goal to go further along the storyline and collect bonuses.

name: Yomas
description: Yomas - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. As you progress through the game, you will encounter new weapons, potions, and coins. All this is required to destroy enemies and bosses!

name: Room Cleaning
description: Room cleaning - addictive game to help you relax. You are only hiring and offering a solution for cleaning dirt, stains and waste disposal and offer it in perfect order! use all available items that can be used in your task!

name: Task Control
description: Task control is a 2D platformer with action elements. You have to play as a special agent and destroy enemies on the level, moving around the locations. Your goal: Destroy the maximum number of enemies and complete the level. First aid kits and grenades will always come to your aid!

name: Possibly Endless Golf
description: Embark on a cozy golfing journey with Possibly Endless Golf. Enjoy this minimalist game in bite-sized chunks or endless rounds. No pressure, no scores, just you and the fairways. Perfect for a quick escape or a relaxing retreat. Your tranquil golfing experience awaits. Tee off today!

name: Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom
description: Get ready for a hilariously outrageous multiplayer FPS experience that combines the meme world of the Skibidi toilet with intense action-packed battles! In "Skibidi Toilet Skibidi Boom" you'll dive headfirst into a quirky universe where two bizarre factions clash for supremacy: the eccentric Cameraheads and the wacky Skibidi Toilets.

name: Sudoku Plug & Play
description: A plug and plug Sudoku game by The New York Times.

name: Just Fighting
description: Just Fighting is an exhilarating survival game that plunges players into a post-apocalyptic world infested with hordes of bloodthirsty zombies. Developed for adrenaline junkies and strategic thinkers, this game offers a unique and immersive experience like no other.

name: The Adventures of Rocky and Bullwinkle and Friends
description: Sin descripción

name: Wayne's World
description:
Wayne's World is an adventure game based on the movie with the same name. The game itself is a classic point and click adventure, and should not be confused with the platform game based on the movie.

You play both Wayne and Garth, and you can switch between them at any time. The plot is simple; In an attempt to save their tv-show, Wayne and Garth decide to hold a pizza-thon (a charity show with a pizza-theme) in order to raise money. In order to be able to hold the pizza-thon Wayne and Garth must embark on several quests to collect items and hire people they need for the show. The adventure includes participating in babe-jeopardy, joining a biker's gang and baking pizza. The graphics are in 2D and the sound contains several samples from the movie.

name: Wayne's World
description: NES Port of "Wayne's World"

name: Solitaire FunPak
description:
Solitaire FunPak is a handheld solitaire game. There are 12 different forms of solitaire to play (Klondike, Tripeaks, Pyramid, Cruel, Freecell, Golf, Canfield, Aces Up, Scorpion, Poker, Stonewall and Florentine).

It also has a tournament mode where players can go for standard games, a full championship, a custom game or a custom game with a time limit. The best scores are stored in the hall of fame.

name: Chase H.Q.
description: As an undercover agent of Chase Headquarters, your job is to patrol the streets and track down five criminals. You are given a mission briefing before you start which gives information on the suspect and what car they drive. Then you drive across the city without crashing into other cars, and catch up with the criminal's car. To arrest the suspects, you must keep bumping into their car until it is no longer functional. And you have to do this under a strict time limit. You can't afford to crash into cars or buildings or you waste time getting on the road again.

name: Bomb Jack
description:
A conversion of the coin op game with 60 stages and 3 levels of difficulty.

Jack is a tiny but explosive character whose dynamism will take your breath away! From platform to platform he is trying hard to light the bombs which will bring him a lot of points, super bonuses and lives. But this won't be easy for his enemies are numerous and they may transform astoundingly in order to be better able to catch him. A captivating challenge for young and old!

name: Tobi D+Vine
description: Shmup spinoff of D+Vine[Luv].

name: 4D:XD
description: 4D:XD is a top-down 2D bullet hell space shooter. Conquer the game with as few deaths as possible!

name: Guitar Hero III Mobile: Song Pack 1
description:
Guitar Hero III Song Pack 1 (Stylized GH3SP1) is a Standalone version of the Guitar Hero III Mobile Port of the game. This version came with new songs and achievements maintaining the same graphics.
The game was developed by Hands On and published by Activision.

name: WWF King of the Ring
description:
WWF King of the Ring is a wrestling game that uses the World Wrestling Federation license. Each wrestler possesses personal attributes in three categories: strength, speed, and stamina. The wrestlers share the same set of moves, consisting of punches, kicks, body slam, throw, dropkick, suplex, stomps, elbow drops, and a move off the turnbuckle. There are no signature moves unique to each wrestler.

There are eleven wrestlers in total: Hulk Hogan, Randy Savage, Lex Luger, Yokozuna, Razor Ramon, Bret Hart, Shawn Michaels, Mr. Perfect, Bam Bam Bigelow, The Undertaker (the last two are absent from the GameBoy version), and a wrestler the player can create with custom attributes. The game features one-on-one matches, championship matches, tag team matches, and the King of the Ring tournament.

name: The Blues Brothers
description:
The Blues Brothers is a platform game based on the band The Blues Brothers, where the object is to evade police and other vigilantes to get to a blues concert.

The characters have the ability to pick up boxes to throw them at enemies. Each level is a variation on the jumping theme, with the characters finding a necessary attribute (e.g. a guitar) somewhere in the level. The sixth and final level ends on-stage.

The game's soundtrack consists of music from the movie. Dimitris Yerasimos composed the music for all versions of the game except for the Game Boy, where Thorsten Mitschele composed the music.

name: The Blues Brothers

name: Karting Superstars
description: Karting Superstars is a charming racing game that captures the exciting and competitive world of karting. Inspired to condense the thrill and beauty of racing, we've dedicated our love, time, and craft into this new game that builds on the celebrated simcade taste of Circuit Superstars.

name: Judge Dredd
description: "Judge Dredd" is a 1995 action-packed video game that expands on the dystopian world of its namesake film and comic book series. Released for SNES, Sega Mega Drive, Game Gear, and later PC, this Probe Software and Acclaim creation surprised critics with its positive reception. The game cleverly extends beyond the movie's plot, introducing a thrilling new story arc featuring the Dark Judges. While the Game Gear version offers a more streamlined experience, other platforms deliver a richer, more expansive journey through Mega-City One's crime-ridden streets, allowing players to dispense justice as the iconic Judge Dredd.

name: The Battle of Olympus
description: Sin descripción

name: BrazSonic 20XX
description: BrazSonic 20XX is a reboot of the BrazSonic series set in 20XX's Brazil, where the congressman Dr. Corruptnik, who dreams of being President of the country, seeks the Corruption Emeralds to make it true. However, his ambition implies chaos and destruction to the lands and citizens. Then the hero BrazSonic will come into the scene to stop him!

name: Colorfle
description: A daily guessing game where players must create a target color by combining multiple colors from a predetermined set. Each failed guess reveals information about which colors must be combined, and in which amounts.

name: Edd the Duck
description: A Game Boy game was developed by Beam Software but never released. An altered version of their game Baby T-Rex, the game was pulled from distribution just before release when the BBC revoked the license but not before it received a negative review in Game Zone magazine.

name: The Hardest Game Ever
description: The Hardest Game Ever is a precision 2D platformer. As the name suggests, it's a very difficult game, so difficult that the developer has created a challenge to pay the first person to beat the game.

name: The Grinch
description: As the Grinch, your mission is to undo Whoville's Holiday preparations in a most mischievous way. With help from lovable Max the Dog, you'll creep stealthily about Whoville, stealing presents and decorations. But be careful, those pesky Whos are determined to stop your despicable acts!

name: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II
description: Megami Tensei Gaiden: Last Bible II is a role-playing video game series developed by Multimedia Intelligence Transfer, Sega, and Menue, and published by Atlus and Sega for multiple platforms. Players explore the game world and fight monsters in menu-based battles; players can also attempt to recruit monsters to their party, and can fuse two allied monsters into a single new one to try to get stronger monsters.

name: The Adventures of Robin Hood
description: From The English Software Company.

name: F-Zero Pocket
description: Select one of the 30 most skillful drivers of all time and boost your way to the top in F-Zero Pocket, a racing fan game made as a tribute to both the GameBoy Color and the F-Zero series.

name: Synopsle
description: A daily guessing game where players try to guess the names of two movies that have been merged into one via an AI description.

name: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's
description: Youtooz Presents: Five Nights at Freddy's is an augmented reality mobile game developed by Youtooz. It was released to coincide with the release of Youtooz's Security Breach wave figures.

name: FNaF World: Outplay
description: FNaF World: Outplay is a Five Nights at Freddy's fan game about to recreate the FNaF World from an RPG format to a Sonic-like platformer format with fast-paced gameplay.

name: Bub's Big Blowout!
description:
Bub and his friends seem to have found themselves lost in a strange new world! Everything is so familiar, yet so different! Will you be able to help Bub and his friends find their way home?

Welcome to "Bub's Big Blowout!", A 3D reimagining of the Bubble Bobble arcade game! Here you can jump, blow bubbles, and burst baddies as bub or one of his 3 friends! Collect fruit, Extend Bubbles, and other collectibles for the best possible score!

name: Choujin Sentai Jetman
description:
Two years have passed since the Jetman triumphed over the evil Vyram faction and saved the Earth. Humanity has flourished again, but peace is fragile, however, one night that peace was destroyed. A remnant of Vyram, hidden in the darkest corners of the universe, has returned to Earth. Renegades and resentful, this group has developed powerful mechanical giants that are wreaking havoc on humanity. They have issued a chilling ultimatum: if the sun goes down, the giants will devastate the world and there will be no hope.​

Faced with this desperate situation, the Choujin Sentai Jetman are forced to meet again to face the greatest threat they have ever known.

name: Space Quest: Incinerations
description: Space Quest: Incineration is a 2012 fan-made sequel to the Space Quest series, created by Chris Ushko. It had been previously started in 1999 as a team project, cancelled, and then revived again as an almost completely different game. Information for both versions of the game are kept on this page.

name: Cave Story: The Desolate
description: Cave Story: The Desolate is a fangame based off of the Cave Story Beta.

name: Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble DX
description: Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble DX is a fan-made remake of the flash game Super Mario Bros. Star Scramble.

name: Sonic Encore
description: Sonic Encore is a fan game that re-imagines some of the classic levels from the Sonic 2D era into a more modern 3D environmental setting.

name: Acceleration of Suguri: Y-Edition
description: Acceleration of Suguri Y-Edition is a fan-made remake of Acceleration of SUGURI. The speed has been cranked up, gameplay and visuals have been polished, along with a more balanced cast and rollback netcode!

name: Nights into Dreams: Pizza Tower
description: Sin descripción

name: Lyra the Tenrec
description: Three levels of classic arcade fun as you collect the crystal wafers while trying to keep eyeborgs at bay. Watch out for the indestructible Ztyx!

name: Supra Smash Bross Devolution
description: Supra Smash Bross Devolution is a satirical take on the Smash Bros. series, with hilariously terrible graphics yet surprisingly deep gameplay.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Bassline
description: Sin descripción

name: Chital's Mini Adventure
description: Small Indie Platformer that started a Game Jam entry in 2022, now polished a little and released! A Single-Level game where you must collect Jewels and defeat a Boss!

name: Rune Factory 3 Special: Another Episode Pack
description: This content requires the base game Rune Factory 3 Special on Steam in order to play.

name: Girl Travels Forest of Dream
description: Let's start the journey with the girl who picks up machete and eats grilled fish! please remember. What is needed to save the world is 'recipes to try', 'border privet', and 'balanced diet'. Needless to say, the smell of cat paws and the warmth of loved ones!

name: Star Realms: High Alert - Heroes
description: The Star Realms: High Alert Heroes expansion contains 12 new multi-faction Heroes. This expansion also includes campaign chapter 25, which has 7 new missions!

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Starlet
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Starlet. Manufactured by United in 1955.

name: Golf Evolution Simulation
description: 30 Main stunt missions, 15 Parking missions, a fun test course map and a complete all-in-one game with all golf carts and modifiability. A different experience with a mix of Arcade and Simulation.

name: Schwarzerblitz: 8-Colors Star Guardians Collaboration Costumes - Chapter 1
description: Go, go, go, Star Guardians! This official collaboration between Schwarzerblitz and 8-Colors Star Guardians Plus brings a superheroic spin to your matches! Get 6 new cosplay costumes inspired by 8CSG and start fighting for Earth now! The DLC includes a stage and a new song for the jukebox/Free Match.

name: Elephant Rave 2
description: The rave goes on! 14 years after his first rave, the elephant has returned for monumental challenge: avoiding very, very deadly beams of light

name: Tappump
description:
Tappump is a fast-paced one-button game.

You control the circle. Your goal is to move forward while avoiding mines and staying within the horizontal boundaries of the screen. Press the button to jump, hold the button to increase range. Collect coins to earn points.

If you hit a mine or go beyond the top or bottom of the screen, the game is over.

name: Sakura School Love
description: The background of the game is an interesting story that happened in the small town of Sakura on the campus. You can also learn more knowledge and experience various daily activities, waiting for players to explore in the game.

name: Hot Wheels Unleashed: AcceleRacers Hollowback
description: Sin descripción

name: Dino Hunt
description: Dino Hunt is 3D first person shooter, made with Javascript, WebGL and Pointer Lock API. Start your journey as dinosaur hunter. Make money by hunting dinosaurs, upgrade your character and weapon.

name: Dino Hunt 2
description: Dino Hunt 2 is a next release of 3D first person shooter, made with Javascript, WebGL, Pointer Lock API and and Touch Events API. It should work in mobile browsers with multitouch and WebGL. Start your journey as dinosaur hunter. Make money by hunting dinosaurs, upgrade your character and weapon.

name: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth
description: Wormhole: Battle for Planet Earth - This is a fantastic third-person action game. In the game you are waiting for aliens, teleporters, dark matter and hurricane action.

name: Hyperdrive Inn
description: Dive into the mysteries of an infinite hotel. Unveil an ever-shifting adventure where every playthrough is unique. Immerse in fabric-crafted visuals, guided by an enchanting score inspired by Finnish folk music. Hyperdrive Inn is a point-and-click journey like no other.

name: Elysian Echoes
description: Elysian Echoes is a traditional, hand crafted souls-like metroidvania with a twist. Take possession of your fallen enemies bodies and unveil your cosmic destiny as you untangle Gaia's turmoil. Adapt to the varied and difficult encounters; learn and use your enemies' moves against them or die trying.

name: Saga of Weil
description: Saga of Weil is an old school side scrolling adventure with some souls-like style combat

name: Duskborn
description: Duskborn is a 3rd-person rouge-like game. Descend into the Abyss as fast as possible, level up by defeating various enemies, collect and combine items to upgrade your player. Maneuver through the Abyss with your jetpack and grappling hook. The race against time is on.

name: Robospital
description: Become a doctor in Robospital and fix robots. Learn programming, write code, and test your code. With vibrant graphics, coding challenges, and a narrative, embark on an undercover mission. Dive into a game where coding meets adventure!

name: Simulator of Ukraine 1991
description: This game is a global strategy, which is primarily focused on Ukraine after leaving the Soviet occupation. Here you will be given control of Ukraine with the opportunity to change history and intervene in the events of that time.

name: Screamdown
description: Scream through your mic at opponents to send them flying into the void in this PvP horror game.

name: A Lively Haunt
description: Are you bold enough to enter A Lively Haunt alone? Or must you join a friend to investigate this 2-player, old-school, text parser adventure game?

name: Magic Force
description: Magic Force is a 3D adventure game. You have to take on the role of a traveler who went in search of new adventures. Explore a mysterious continent that has been poisoned and help the locals find an antidote.

name: Karen's Fault
description: Join Karen in her uphill battle. But remember, there will be a lot of anger in this adventure...

name: Burger Shop 3
description: Make tasty food items to serve hungry customers in this fast-paced sequel to the amazing food making games Burger Shop 1 & 2!

name: Woodland Isle
description: Explore the enchanting world of Woodland Isle, a captivating exploration game that invites you to embark on a tranquil journey through a lush, mysterious island. Uncover hidden locations, from ancient campsites to majestic trees and the remains of giants.

name: Becca
description: Becca is a short point-and-click, interactive story book.

name: Excalibur's Swordstone Idle Forge
description: Pull legendary swords from stones, upgrade your forge, trade with factions, and craft artifacts in this idle clicker game of medieval mastery.

name: One Night: Burlesque
description: Step into the smoky, seductive world of the Angels Den, a luxurious burlesque club. Get into the high heels of Holly, a talented dancer graced with a unique gift of telepathy. Help her on a desperate mission to save a friend from certain doom.

name: Vadi
description: Build your own kingdom in the dark valley where zombies rule and stay safe from zombies. It is up to you to survive in this valley.

name: Slime Alchemist
description: Turn-based tactics and roguelike deckbuilding with a twist! Forge your path across a procedural overworld, spend time as a resource to play cards, and build your deck from the techniques of vanquished foes. Hone your strategy and become the greatest slime of all!

name: Clash of Blades
description: Clash of Blades is an online multiplayer gladiatorial real-time sword fighting VR game with a special kill determination system - dismantling of enemy's body modules, creating a unique and groundbreaking gaming experience, and turning your dream of wielding a sword at home into reality!

name: Redemption?
description: Death came unexpectedly.It's time to understand whether I have lived this life correctly.It's time to finish the story of my life and understand what punishment awaits me for my actions, or were they right?

name: Chained Together
description: From the depths of hell, climb chained to your friends through diverse worlds. Solo or co-op, try to reach the summit and discover what awaits you there...

name: Departed Away
description: Discover 'Departed Away,' a captivating visual novel where friendship intertwines with mystery. Uncover secrets, engage in verbal duels, and make choices that shape your story. Delve into emotional depth and intricate connections in this unique story.

name: Secret of the Vikings 2: The World Tree
description: Inexplicable disasters haunt the Vikings. Help Valkyrie Fenja and Raven Yorin rebuild the destroyed village and find out what is behind the mysterious events.

name: Three Random Archives
description: In this action-adventure game play a collection of three short stories all confined within a single package. Shoot your way to survival, platform your way to victory, and explore a distant but familiar city! Just whatever you do, stay off circus grounds!!! (It's private property.)

name: Deadpoint
description: "Deadpoint" is an engaging third-person survival game set in an apocalyptic world overrun by zombies. Players take on the role of a resourceful scavenger, tasked with navigating the dangerous landscape and ensuring their survival amid the hordes of undead.

name: Louma
description: Louma is a Roguelike Dungeon Crawler. Fight through the procedural generated floors and save the World of Louma.

name: Synthwave Ascension
description: Survive and fight off killer robots as you grow stronger and stronger! Synthwave Ascension is a top-down shooter with roguelite elements and synthwave themes.

name: World War 1: Ruined - Part 2
description: Ruined Part 2 DLC: Free, Thrilling, and Here! Explore 3 new maps, experience an innovative game mode, and enjoy enhanced visuals/audio. Your journey continues with an epic storyline. Let's dive in! - RonStar Studios

name: FolcDark: Part I
description: FolcDark: Part I is the sequel to the prologue of a third-person dark fantasy action-adventure game, with a story and characters focused on Brazilian folklore.

name: Xaphan: Battle Simulator
description: Xaphan is a third person shooter mixed with sandbox battle simulator featuring zombies, huge insects, medieval knights, animals and monsters.

name: Exit the Backrooms
description: Embark on a journey through 8 meticulously crafted levels that blur the line between the mundane and the surreal. Each environment, designed to captivate the senses, pushes the boundaries of what you thought you knew.

name: Matchpoop
description: Step into a world overrun by mischievous poops! Rally allies, employ match-N mechanics to battle and flush them down the drain. Conquer poop overlords, reclaim the bathroom in this addicting game!

name: Semu
description: Space adventure can be scary, so that's why we at InkForge Studios have developed the most advanced Space Suit ever - the Semu suit. Standing for Survival Extra-vehicular Mobility Unit, it will keep you safe as you journey the cosmos. With survival guaranteed, what else is there to worry about?

name: The Johnny Papa
description: The Johnny Papa is a strategic multiplayer horror game with 3 main characters, 5 side characters and 1 murderer. Welcome to the village of Agris.

name: Rising Dead
description: Survive a zombie-infested mall for 3 days. Fight, scavenge, rescue, and customize your character in this dynamic game.

name: Gem
description: This is a 2D science fiction casual game, where players can gain increasingly fulfillment by collecting and exploring in the universe. The non-competitive game mode can also bring relaxation to users.

name: The Adventures of Bunny and Pig
description: Narrative game where Bunny heals an injured Pig and then together they fight against monsters. Psychological healing theme with a cute art style.

name: Unexpected Visitors
description: Step back in time to the 1950s and immerse yourself in a chilling tale shrouded in mystery in "Unexpected Visitors." Play as Barbara Clark, a housewife whose picturesque life takes a nightmarish turn when she returns home to find her children and babysitter mysteriously vanished.

name: Mahjick: The Realm Taker
description: "Mahjick - The Realm Taker" is a turn-based strategy game combining Roguelike and Mahjong Elements. Embark into this epic journey of taking the throne and to become the Keeper by defeating enemies for Enchantments and Skills, and Ronning your tiles for Attribute and Talent skills.

name: Observer
description: Observer is a 3D hand-drawn cartoon roguelite game. You will become the legendary heroes of the forest, choose a new destiny for them, and guard this mysterious forest for them.

name: LastSafeZone
description: How will you live in a chaotic world? I have to explore outside anyway

name: Ultradian
description: Ultradian is an intense JRPG adventure featuring turn-based combat, Survival Horror elements, and resource management. You must escape the war-torn town of Lgov within 24 hours before a devastating nuclear bomb is unleashed! But beware, falling asleep means certain death!

name: God's Forest
description: God's Forest is a Roguelite Bullet-Hell. Gather powerful items and weapons, battle the guardians of the dungeon, and maybe even make a few friends along the way!

name: Survival on a Deserted Island
description: The players of 'Survival on a deserted island' are immersed in a challenging and adventurous desert island. We need to constantly explore islands, find resources to manage our hunger, thirst, and physical strength, and build shelters to resist the threat of terrifying skeletons wandering around.

name: Paint Desk Simulator
description: Welcome to Paint Desk Simulator! In this game, you own a small paint-mixing company. As you rise through the ranks, you will start to be able to automate the paint mixing process. You need to strategize your days and always think ahead. Good luck, and all hail Radiant.

name: Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance
description: As Himiko Masaki continues the search for her mother, the resistance to change ever marches on when new rebellion groups challenge the city's obsession with Shinogi Chess, and the struggle for truth envelops Yoshino High School. Every move counts in Shinogi Chess Club 2: Resistance!

name: Little Monkey King's Big Quest
description: Welcome to "Little Monkey King's Big Quest"! Exciting adventures await you alongside the Little Monkey King.

name: Let Him Cook
description: Let Him Cook is a top-down action roguelite where you play as a food industry professional fighting in bullet hell's kitchen. When food fights back, you gotta cook. Jam to the music, hire assistants, and face against all kinds of live food puns!

name: Dungeon Create
description: Roused from sleep, I'm in a dusty cave, named the master of a dungeon!? I'm "forced" to manage it... Defend against daring adventurers!

name: Evil Snowmen 2
description: Evil Snowmen 2 - This is an improved port of the mobile game with a nice winter atmosphere and evil enemies snowmen. The game is not long, the average passage of the story will take about 30 minutes.

name: Island Hopper
description: Oh no! Your island got hit by a tornado. Can you rebuild your island and help out your friends? Enjoy randomly generated islands with different biomes to collect the resources you need to upgrade your gear and save your home. But don't leave the enemies out of your sight!

name: Wordle DS
description: A clone of Wordle for the Nintendo DS. The game features the same words as the official Wordle.

name: Blue Cradle: Signifie
description: A novel game with a fully voiced story about everyday or extraordinary stories.

name: Invert by SlushyRh
description: Embark on a precision platformer journey to the moon! You'll climb, fall, then cry and do it all again.

name: Unnamed Experiment
description: What could be more disorienting than finding yourself in a point-and-click puzzle game with no words at all? You wake up in a cell, surrounded by symbols and traces that make no sense. An atmospheric journey awaits. Immerse yourself in piecing clues together, but don't get lost in the surreal world.

name: Dadlympics
description: Engage in physics-based fun! Conquer hilarious dad-worthy challenges with friends in the DADLYMPICS. Are you ready to claim the title of ultimate dad?

name: Tax Evasion
description: An action filled roguelike, where you climb the floors of the IRS headquarters to reclaim what is rightfully yours... Your money. Take down your enemies. Buy items with their money. And climb the floors. Unlock new characters and abilities to approach this office building in many different ways.

name: Slime Experiments
description: A 2D top down puzzle game where you play as a slime that must go through various experiments after finding yourself captured by some sort of slime researcher.

name: Manor of Mysteries
description: Manor of Mysteries is a horror-puzzle multiplayer game. Explore a manor full of randomized rooms! Solve puzzles, survive monsters, escape traps. Work with your friends to solve this manor's mysteries! Can you survive 100 rooms? Or will you be another lost victim to the manor?

name: Stellario
description: In a large star field, the Spirit flies around and absorbs stars to build up mass and take on a different appearance. But you have to be careful on the journey - there are black holes scattered around the field, and also spaceships flying at unthinkable speeds.

name: Hover Shooting Defence
description: Aliens have invaded for Earth's resources. They dominated nature and made them attack mankind. Humanity on the verge of extinction has gathered the last of its strength and developed a superconducting hovertank that can stand against them. Now our counterattack begins.

name: Violet
description: You woke up in a Forest's Cemetery, with no memory. Uncover the secrets, solve Riddles and Puzzles in a Psychological Thriller based on the Classic Survival Horror Games that you liked best in the 90's with Modern Over the Shoulder angles. From the same creator of Trauma Broken Paradise.

name: Skeletons Uprising
description: Play alone or grab up to 4 friends and survive wave-based rounds and special enemies. Collect parts, Craft special items, and Explore the maps to unlock secrets and increase your chances of survival. Have fun and stay alive.

name: ICode Stem Universe
description: Dive into a VR universe of knowledge! Explore space, engineer inventions, and journey through Earth's history. Discover, learn, and be amazed.

name: Hajikise!
description:
Released in 2009, Hajikise! is a turn-based RPG for Windows PC.
It was developed and released by Hachimitsu Kumasan, a doujin game developer.

Hajikise! is a traditional Japanese RPG that uses two-dimensional top-down view.
Characters can be customized from a number of different classes and their skills.

name: Roaming Backrooms
description: This is a back room style game. There are many rooms in the game, like a maze, where players need to find a way out. Mainly focused on exploration, with some frightening elements. There may be monsters waiting for players around the corner, or chasing them. There is no bloody content.

name: The Sentinel
description: Defend your castle against waves of invaders in 'The Sentinel,' a tower defense game. Strategically upgrade weapons and defenses, make tough choices, and immerse yourself in intense battles. Will you triumph and protect your realm?

name: Murder Miners X
description: The long-awaited sequel to the #1 rated Xbox Live Indie Game is not here yet, but it will be (Believe). Classic FPS gunplay with awesome parkour. Online, 4 player Splitscreen! Block-based destructible maps. Vehicles. Zombies. PVP Infection: Devour your victims, get new zombie powers!

name: Games Advent Calendar: 25 Days - 25 Surprises
description: In Games advent calendar, immerse yourself in that fantastic Christmas spirit, an exciting new game, every day for 25 days!

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Rio
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Rio. Manufactured by United in 1953.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Mexico
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Mexico. Manufactured by United in 1954.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Manhattan
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Manhattan. Manufactured by United in 1955.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Hawaii
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Hawaii. Manufactured by United in 1954.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Caravan
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Caravan. Manufactured by United in 1956.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: United Brazil
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Brazil. Manufactured by United in 1956.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Agogo
description: Simulation of an imaginary electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Agogo. Created in 2017. Machine never really manufactured though.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Yacht Club
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Yacht Club. Manufactured by Bally in 1953.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Acapulco
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Acapulco. Manufactured by Bally in 1961.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Atlantic City
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Atlantic City. Manufactured by Bally in 1952.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Bali
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Bali. Manufactured by Bally in 1974.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Ballerina
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Ballerina. Manufactured by Bally in 1959.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Beach Beauty
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beach Beauty. Manufactured by Bally in 1955.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Beach Time
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beach Time. Manufactured by Bally in 1958.

name: Bingo Pinball Gameroom: Bally Beach Club
description: Simulation of an electromechanical Bingo Pinball machine, model Beach Club. Manufactured by Bally in 1953.

name: Satebo's Word Game
description: Sin descripción

name: BlooDooMoon Survivor
description: Welcome to this survival sandbox game! Your plane made a forced landing during the Bermuda storm. You will need to establish your own survival base from scratch, collect materials, make tools, build towns, manufacture weapons, explore unknown fields. Will you conquer the challenges?

name: Hilda and the Tower of Lust
description: The mightiest female warrior, Hilda, will face a tower teeming with monsters... Can she defeat the demon king without letting down the hero?

name: Save The Toast!
description:
Flappy bird has nothing on this toast-chomping monster! Hone in your skills and take the toast challenge! Help this little toast monster find his toast!

This game includes 10 levels of action-packed adventure! Play in the bright happy sun, as well as a cloudy rainy day. Change the weather as the decade, because "Save the Toast" Now includes 3 never before seen Vintage levels.

name: Rocky Wings
description:
Discover Rocky Wings: An endless airplane arcade game that challenges your piloting skills!
You are the pilot in command in this casual fly-and-wreck-a-plane-simulator. Hop into the cockpit of the Checko 120 (your first own airplane), collect 12 more aircraft and unlock 13 challenging achievements. Fire up the engine and off you go. Who needs checklists, anyway?

name: Fight Bingo
description:
Five lines Bingo fight.
You can play with a powerful AI.
Five lines to win!

name: Hop N' Drop
description: Guide Hoppins on his way down and endless series of platforms. Tap to jump but make sure you time it just right. Hop N' Drop is a simple, charming, and cute one-tap endless game that will have you playing for hours. What ever you do don't let Hoppins touch the spikes or it's game over.

name: Pinocchio: Interactive Book
description: Pinocchio. Interactive classic stories for all ages.

name: Simulator Bundle: Gas Station Simulator and Barn Finders
description:
Looking for a simulator bundle that will grab you for hours?
Here it is!

name: Dark Theme Bundle
description: Face your fears with this spooky bundle!

name: Life's 2 Short: Unhooked
description: A mysterious message in a bottle calls a little ghost to reunite a pirate captain with his 4 wayward wives...

name: Selection I & II
description: Sin descripción

name: Desktop Pet
description: Desktop Pet is a life simulation game where you can take care of cute creatures while working or playing on your computer. Write documents, play games, watch videos, all together with your little companion.

name: Zooo
description: A puzzle game. The player has to line up the animals pictures and make them disappear.

name: Heartium
description: A fantasy SRPG.

name: Mr. Platformer
description: Run! Jump? Swim?! Mr. Platformer can do it all!

name: Mind Puzzle 2023
description: Mind Puzzle 2023: Dive into a world where physics reigns and every level offers endless possibilities. With just rectangles and circles at your disposal, discover your unique solution in this riveting casual game. Challenge the usual, embrace the extraordinary!

name: Roman Empire Simulator
description: Conquer, defend, and rise! Dive into the grandeur of ancient Rome in this gripping blend of Tower Defense and war strategy. Transform your humble settlement into history's mightiest empire. Defend against ferocious armies and expand your dominion over Europe and Africa. Ready your arrows and flames!

name: Monolith O Pesadelo
description: First person horror, Simple short game, look for keys, unlock passages. Be in an unknown location with a Dark atmosphere. In each phase there will be a different challenge, survive and advance while you try not to get caught. Avoid Scares.

name: Juicy Retro Style!: Bloodhound
description: Bring the Bloodhound world fully into the retro dimension ️ and enjoy juicy old-style gameplay!

name: Crimson Needle 3
description: Play as The Kid, and traverse a vast world of profoundly challenging platforming with a wide variety of atmospheres and visual styles.

name: WannaFest 22
description:
After the events of I Wanna Be The Guy, The Kid is invited to a game show hosted by an imposing figure! Fight your way through several game challenges to compete for a high score. Do you have what it takes to master these games and win the grand prize?

Developed by Cherry Treehouse for Fangame Marathon 2022's Blind Adventure event, WannaFest 22 is a fast-paced rollercoaster through hidden gaming gems of the past!

name: BulletHeck
description: BulletHeck is a chaotic top-down bullet-hell game where you play as Grimboni and Bimboni, two creatures who have been sentenced to be strung together and fight enemies that appear out of portals in Heck for all of eternity. Collect different pick-ups that change the different kinds of bullets you fire at enemies, slaying as many of these wicked beasts as you can.

name: The Bowyage
description:
The Bowyage is a low fantasy platformer inspired by the NES Castlevania games, where you control Yew Bowman, a member of the low nobility and a longbowman, in his journey of conquests against his other two elder brothers.
Yew, lacking resources, figured that he needs to gain power to fend off against his two more powerful brothers, so with his trusty bow and arrow and his loyal army, he marches towards the path of conquest.

name: Sonic Test Labs
description:
Here at Hedgehog Testing Inc., we take the matter of rogue and spikey rodents very seriously. They're a threat and a menace to society!

So what have we decided to do? Take matters into our own hands by capturing these creatures and studying them to their fullest extent. All sponsored by G.U.N. of course!

name: Break Arts III
description: Freely customize your own robots to win high-speed matches! With the brand new Co-op Mode and Diorama Mode, this game is a fresh new addition to the series.

name: Fight Crab 2
description: Flip your opponents on their backs in this crustacean wrestling fighting game! Come up with your own strategies and use the deceivingly deep physics engine to your advantage. Challenge mighty foes in Career Mode, or pit your crab against others in online multiplayer.

name: Great Wall March
description: A turn-based fantasy JRPG.

name: Evil Girls Party!
description: A turn-based dark fantasy JRPG.

name: Pokémon Mino
description: At the beginning of their journey, the trainer and sailor go to the Hishout Dungeon to see the very rare Pokémon, Graykid. When Team Digital arrives has a plan to steal the Pokémon, Graykid. Even though who's gonna stop Team Digital? Their good friends Damian and Skyla are the adventurous trainers in a whole wide world.

name: Rocher no Nagai Yoru
description: A turn-based fantasy JRPG.

name: Misty no Kira-kira Hanjouki
description: A turn-based fantasy JRPG.

name: Pokémon: Burning Lotus
description: The game takes place in a new region called Lotus, a region that is filled with Pokémon from every previous generation, including new species as well. You take control as either a male or female protagonist, and the region has eight gym leaders who are all returning leaders from previous games.

name: Say Something Positive About
description:
The game where players have to say something positive about ANYTHING!

A player writes a prompt, the other players have to come up with something positive to say about it!

name: Sparkster PC
description: A reimagined version of the Genesis version of Sparkster that aims to create something new and exciting with its existing ideas and assets.

name: Megaman X in Sonic Blasting Adventure
description: A fan game that adds X and Zero from the Mega Man X series into Sonic Blasting Adventure.

name: Sonic Colors Demastered
description:
Sonic Colors Demastered is a 2D reimagining of Sonic Colors for the Nintendo Wii and Nintendo DS. The game features gameplay inspired by the Sonic Rush series and a fully original level design and soundtrack.

Join Sonic, Tails, and a colorful cast of aliens to put a stop to Eggman’s plans for interstellar domination! Use Sonic’s signature suite of abilities, including the boost, grind, and homing attack, to make your way through exhilarating, high-speed 2D platforming challenges!

name: Sonic Colors VN
description: Sonic Colors VN is a remake of Sonic Colors DS in a Visual Novel format using the Ren'Py game engine. This project bridges the gap between all versions of the tale, stringing their plot threads together.

name: Sonic 04
description: A loving tribute to the good old days when Sonic fangames were worse than the official onres.

name: LocoMotion
description:
Locomotion is an Action, Platformer Game Inspired by many other Games out there. This game has a fascinating story behind it! Play it to find out what secrets the Acidic Waters have in store for you!
You play as a crash test dummy and the people who made you need to test your strength.

name: Sonic 3000
description: A fast-paced Sonic fan game with an improved moveset and no speedcap.

name: Mekanikko
description: Mekanikko is an RPG that takes place in the world of modern steampunk. Explore the world of automatons, as weird things are always about to happen. Meet wacky characters with each of their own story tell. Solve cases with your sugar-freak partner, and find out the truth of this mechanical city.

name: Hot Job 94'
description: Hot Job 94 is a 3D action platformer inspired by the early 2000's GameCube games such as Sonic Adventure and Super Mario Sunshine. Control 5 different characters with unique attributes like speed, flight, shooting, and combat.

name: Funtography: A Gameboy Cameradventure
description: In Funtography, enjoy looking at 100+ Gameboy Camera pictures as you explore various urban vistas to solve the mystery of a missing video game prototype.

name: Sonic McOrigins Plus
description: An update to Sonic McOrigins that adds Shadow Hockey, Amy/Rouge Volleyball, and Shadow Basketball.

name: EdelSuche
description: EdelSuche is a Rockman-style-doujin-ish-action-platformer game where you play as Cecilia Wonderwand, a mage apprentice who finds herself in need to save the world from "The Rot".

name: Beep Bap The Beep Boop
description: Beep Bap The Beep Boop is a 3D platformer inspired by Spyro, Banjo and Zelda! Explore colorful worlds and talk to a variety of charming NPCs! Use your surroundings to aid in combat & use shields to block and parry enemy attacks!

name: Rocket League: Season 12
description:
Home to Rocket League’s opening day, Neo Tokyo’s megalithic tech scene and neon-soaked cityscape make for a landmark Arena setting. But fanged rumors lurk amongst the roots of these glittering towers. Notorious hacktivist Zero-Day has gained access to the city's digital infrastructure, and although their motives remain unclear, the city's underbelly buzzes with anticipation of what’s to come.

How will you survive this world of digital disruption? Override your Garage with the Porsche 911 Turbo, go incognito with Rocket Pass rewards, and play Soccer in Zero-Day’s corrupted vision of Neo Tokyo.

Season 12 begins on September 6, no password required!

name: Super Mario 64 Another Castle
description:
In this ROM hack, it has been 5 years since Super Mario 64, Peach has given up being the monarch of the mushroom kingdom and is in the process of moving into a new castle however bowser already kidnapped her. On top of that mario went out to rescue peach and get the stolen power stars but he is yet to be seen ever since that trip. It is up to you to rescue the princess again and find the whereabouts of Mario.

This hack features
- 6 main worlds
- 2 bowser course's
- a new hub area
- custom hud elements
- luigi as the main character

name: One Tap
description: "One Tap" is a high-octane first-person shooter game that delivers an immersive and competitive gaming experience. It's all about the thrill of the game, the strategy, and the skill. The unique twist? You get to choose an in-game asset with special abilities that can turn the tide of the battle. The special characters in the game are digital assets or "NFT" stored using blockchain technology.

name: Beautiful Sakura: Surfing Club
description: A visual novel focused on mental health and personal identity. Help your character fit into the new city you moved to and find new friends. As part of your journey, you will be able to listen to the people around you and learn to surf for the first time. Player choice affects how the narrative will progress, including special dialogue to discover for key scenes.

name: eFootball 2024: Leo Messi Edition
description: Messi, the living legend, is joining your team. Introducing the special boosted edition of "eFootball" - No better time to start playing eFootball than now!

name: Amorphous
description: Amorphous is a 4v1 multiplayer experience where one player takes control of the elusive shape-shifting slime, seeking to consume and contaminate various locations across space and time. Meanwhile, the team of 4 relentless Cleaners unite and attempt to eradicate the ever-evolving threat.

name: RainyDay
description: Story The main character was taking shelter from the rain at a bus stop when it suddenly started to rain. Then a soaking wet woman appears to take shelter from the rain as well. While having a casual conversation, the two get closer to each other. And then...

name: Pixel Puzzles World War II Jigsaws Pack: Invasion of Poland
description: Pixel Puzzles World War II, merging history with the definitive jigsaw puzzler on the PC platform.

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 1
description: Includes 16 new puzzles, each featuring stunning images of the Milky Way and its celestial wonders. A perfect addition for astronomy enthusiasts and puzzle lovers looking to expand their cosmic journey.

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles: Expansion Pack 2
description: Includes 16 new puzzles, each featuring stunning images of the Milky Way and its celestial wonders. A perfect addition for astronomy enthusiasts and puzzle lovers looking to expand their cosmic journey.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Boruto Uzumaki (Karma)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Featured in this "Master Character Training Pack" is the one-and-only Boruto Uzumaki (Karma)!

name: Invector: Rhythm Galaxy - Latin Power Song Pack
description: Latin Power Song Pack, showcasing electrifying tunes from Latin urban sensations like Yng Lvcas, Tiago PZK, Myke Towers, and more—bringing a fresh wave of Latin hip-hop to the gaming world.

name: Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar - Bannermen Pack
description: Let your enemies on the battlefield know what they are dealing with. The free Bannermen DLC for Hegemony Rome: The Rise of Caesar adds four new and fully-animated units to the game: including the Roman Aquilifer and the Gallic Hornblower.

name: Frontier Hunter: Costume Pack Season 3
description: After the empire invented the airship, people finally became able to fly across float continents and islands. Erza leads an exploration team to explore the savage frontier where the empire can’t reach. When they break through all difficulties and reaches the destination, what awaits them is...

name: BustyBiz: Anna Pack
description: This very first Busty Biz DLC introduces you to feisty Finn Anna, a gamer girl who has both beauty and brains. Purchase this DLC and unlock Anna, together with a special (SFW) wallpaper!

name: Bomber Crew: Skin Pack
description: Need a new look for your Bomber, but about to send your Crew off for another perilous run? Don’t fear, the Bomber Skin Pack is here!

name: Pinball FX3: Star Wars Pinball Season 1 Bundle
description: Sin descripción

name: Viral
description: Stylized sci-fi FPS shooter

name: Willow Guard
description: Willow Guard is a single player story-driven fantasy RPG that combines dungeon-crawling action gameplay with a choice-based interactive fiction.

name: Wisp Child
description: Join Mylo in this coming of age adventure as they explore magical woods, hone their alchemy skills, and repair their troubled relationship with Ademia. Unravel the secrets of wisps, and even learn to control them. Meet fun and quirky characters, and find your place in the village.

name: Wreckage
description: A classic car combat game set in a post-apocalyptic sunny south Florida. Fast-paced gameplay, a wide variety of vehicles and weapons to choose from, and killer stories for each and every driver.

name: Zbuki Zoo Strategic Comedy
description: Humorous strategy with unique set of characters: buff genius, precious kung fu lady, half-ton puppy, cool spitter and much more. Plus some non-standard structures to build and quirky maps to explore. You can find these only in Zbukiland.

name: VR Dinosaur Island Paradise
description: This is an immersive VR casual game. Players will experience the fun of driving cars freely in the virgin forest. In the game, you will be in a vibrant dinosaur paradise and enjoy the beauty of nature.

name: Candy Crisis
description: Candy Crisis is an exciting combination of pure action and puzzle gaming! The game features twelve unique stages, complete with its own character and individual technique. Also, you can pair off against a friend, and even specify a handicap so that both players are evenly matched. And if you don't want to play against an opponent, Solitaire Crisis mode allows you to practice without having to compete against an opponent. A tutorial is included with the game as well, so even puzzle novices can become Candy Crisis champions in no time.

name: Vigilante Racer
description: Race across walls, ceilings, and cloud-piercing tracks in a world where sci-fi hover tech rules. Test gravity extremes in The Pit, be the hero in City racing by stopping criminals and bring speed to another level in Skyway. Follow a story for the first chapter's release.

name: Vampire's Kiss
description: Unleash your lust and your thirst in a battle for the soul of London! Will passion lead you back to humanity, or will you embrace the night as a vampire?

name: Up Against Aliens
description: Navigate cosmic debris using time-bending tech in this 3D platformer. Solve puzzles and thwart the alien threat across shifting landscapes. Will you be Earth's unexpected savior when you go Up Against Aliens?

name: Unstable Scientific
description: Rescue scientists, build your own lab, and discover the secret of Toromiro Island in this intricate pixel art platformer!

name: Upbound
description: You have fallen into a pit, and the only way out is up. Can you climb your way up without falling?

name: Tom the Postgirl
description: Take a ride with Tom through her village and discover a great deal—perhaps too much—about the locals. Her approach, although controversial, is highly effective: intense and obsessive stalking.

name: Too Shroom!
description: Slash your way through hoards of hellish shrooms, defending your once peaceful land, or attacking the infinite procedural enemy fortress! Choose upgrades that synergize with your build to survive as long as possible against the infinitely scaling waves of monsters attempting to overwhelm you!

name: Towerbolt
description: Towerbolt is a fast paced vertical platformer set in the year 239X. Race to the top of a cyberpunk Megatower while outrunning lethal security lasers on every floor!

name: Two Putt
description: Two Putt is a mini golf party game where you control multiple golfers at the same time. Help Komakai and Kyoichi conquer 100+ courses and 20+ wacky mini games to become mini golf champions!  Hit the links solo, or grab some friends (1-4 players)

name: Toy Trains
description: Let’s play Toy Trains! A playful track-building VR game where you create your own small world and engage in a captivating storyline. It’s all about imagination, creative thinking, having fun and… trains!

name: The War of 2022
description: Enlist, fight, and decide how loyal you are to your country in this modern military war novel!

name: They Come In Waves
description: Forge your path through unending zombie swarms! Craft inferno-spewing flamethrowers & explosive rocket launchers for ultimate undead domination. How long will you survive?

name: ThinkExplosive
description: ThinkExplosive is a first-person puzzle-platformer about bombs! Throw bombs to overcome obstacles - or launch yourself to new heights! Explore the corridors of an abandoned facility and discover new game mechanics.

name: The Weird Dream
description: The Wierd Dream is a hand-drawn anime style 2D horizontal action-adventure Metroidvania game. You play as a mysterious Rabbit in the middle of a destroyed city. Defeat residents who have been alienated and continue to improve yourself to finally unlock the ultimate secret behind.

name: The Last Braincell
description: Do you ever want to revisit the good old days of bouncing screen savers? Well not only can you do that you can also add whatever images you'd like to it, customize its background to whatever you'd want it to be, and even play around with them as you brain blast your last few brain cells!

name: The Rabbit Haul
description: The Rabbit Haul is a tower defense farming game with roguelite elements where you grow a healthy ecosystem of plants that yield crops during the day and that will help defend your farm from the Trash Panda Posse at night.

name: Thetawave
description: Thetawave is a physics-based space shooter with procedurally generated levels, diverse foes, and distinct characters.

name: The Last General
description: Lead your army through raging conflicts in this massive RTS modern war game. Execute tactics and conquer the resources you need to achieve your goals. Take the enemy territory, perform assassinations, lead insurrections, rescue your stranded troops and much more, in millions of different missions.

name: The House
description: Escape from the house where it all began, collect items, weapons and level up. Travel between worlds and through time to reach your goal. Go discover the dark secrets of the House where it all began!

name: Telebbit
description: No future for mankind. Now, rabbits rule the world. A fast-paced platform game using teleporters.

name: The Amazing Crackpots Club!
description: The Amazing Crackpots Club! is a fast-paced, action-packed magic duel in a 2D arena, where wizards throw powerful spells trying to destroy the opponent’s pots, while using mobility and defensive abilities to protect their own pots from incoming attacks.

name: The Backrooms: Unbounded
description: The Backrooms: Unbounded is a Free single player first person body camera horror game based on the backrooms. You take the role of a police officer who noclips out of reality while on duty. Will you make it out alive?

name: The Barnacle Squad
description: The Barnacle Squad is a tactical turn-based RPG set in the slimy, tentacle-infested waters of a flooded necropolis. Choose from 12 distinct character classes as you manage your squad of mercenaries rowing through a labyrinth of nautical fiends.

name: The Galaxy Rider
description: Welcome to The Galaxy Rider! Cruise the cosmos as a space taxi driver! Your mission? Get rich while carrying passengers between planets. Ready for an out-of-this-world ride?

name: The Attic
description: A Survival Horror Mystery Explorer

name: The Garden of Silvergrass
description: The main character, Naho, meets a mysterious fox spirit named Semi in a silver grass field. Fall into her lovely charm. The closer you get to her, the more you will face her and your dark past. Can your choice create a new future?

name: Stormworks: Space
description: Stormworks: Space is the space mechanics and moon location expansion for Stormworks. This expansion includes the vacuum of space, the moon, and all new space-grade components and equipment.

name: Stellar Tunes
description: One button rhythm game.

name: Starship Troopers: Terran Command - Raising Hell
description: A series of 7 new missions tell the story of the struggle on planet Gehenna - an unforgiving hellscape engulfed in molten lava, volcanic eruptions, and hordes of Arachnids.

name: Square City Builder
description: Build the small pixel city of your dreams! From classic city-building games, Square City Builder offers various ways to customize your gameplay, from constructing houses, farms, or roads to facing random events. In this game, you're in control!

name: Spelling Spree
description: It's a word game! It's a team-based shooter! Battle it out in the arena to collect the most letter tiles, then ascend to an overhead view and play words on the arena floor to capture territory for your team. Spelling words on a game board, in a fast-paced shooter, with a gamepad? Yes!

name: Time For Revenge
description: Time For Revenge is a co-op survival horror game for 1-6 player. Get your revenge from the Chef. But be careful, Chef can't see well but he can sense your smell very well. You need to solve the puzzles and complete the tasks to save the children. Escape from the town before Chef gets you.

name: Scram!
description: Scram! is a platformer based on speed. Play as Boki, a mischievous goblin with a need for speed. Slash, dash, and dive your way through enemies as you loot the Petrifying Forest, Castle Ruins, and various other biomes. Fight off massive bosses in fast paced gameplay.

name: Shipwrecked
description: Fight your way to establish yourself as the greatest pirate in a newly discovered archipelago, battling numerous other pirate factions and navies along the way in strategic turn-based combat, all while managing your own resources and armada. Crown the true king of pirates in your own way.

name: Shutdown
description: Engage in heart-pounding top-down shooter action as a skilled operative fighting against powerful mega-corporations in a dystopian future. Unleash a barrage of futuristic weaponry, master tactical combat, and liberate humanity from the clutches of oppression in Shutdown.

name: Side by Size
description: Side by Size is a puzzle game where taking damage and healing changes the puzzle layout. Purposefully get hurt to open the way to the exit in 100 hand crafted puzzles!

name: Sim the Sand
description: "Sim The Sand" is an exhilarating adventure game, blending low-poly TPS visuals and music to immerse players in the enigmatic atmosphere of the micro world. Join Sim, a grain of sand, on a perilous journey to reunite with its family amidst danger and challenges.

name: Slime Masters
description: In Slime Masters, defend the town from menacing monsters as a valiant hero. Choose from 5+ unique characters, level up, acquire powers, and embark on quests. Unleash strategic combat and become the legendary Slime Master in this endless adventure of bravery and heroism.

name: Secrets of the Haunted Mansion
description: "Secrets of the Haunted Mansion" is an immersive interactive adventure game that transports players into the dark and mysterious world of an abandoned and haunted estate. Step into the shoes of an explorer, ready to unearth forgotten secrets and unravel intriguing puzzles.

name: Seer's Gambit
description: Seer's Gambit is a strategic, semi-auto battler that rewards smart positioning, player agency and building a team that plays to each character’s strength. Explore a perilous world to unlock new heroes for the perfect team composition or upgrade nodes for powerful group buffs.

name: Sex Story: Cuckold Life - Episode 3
description: A steamy Visual Novel featuring high-definition graphics and realistic-looking characters set in beautiful decor. The story continues with Nikki going to the gym on a Saturday morning, attempting to seduce her new smoking hot trainer for a quickie, despite her husband’s reluctance.

name: Raioh
description: Raioh is a retro style shot and bomb style vertical scroll shmup.

name: Samawa Idle
description: Unleash the power of specialized towers to annihilate hordes of monsters in this idle game with roguelike elements. Collect gold, level up your towers, face powerful bosses, and refine your strategy with an evolving skill tree.

name: Royal Romances: Endless Winter - Collector's Edition
description: Sometimes saving one life can change the fate of many. Can you melt the ice in people's hearts?

name: Realm of Dread
description: Take a step into the Realm of Dread's world of horror and suspense. Explore mysterious locations, fight for survival within the realm of supernatural entities and uncover the secrets hidden in the shadows. This journey through darkness requires courage and intellect. Are you ready?

name: Project Otherside
description: Project Otherside is a horror exploration game. Where players will be transported to an otherworldly dimension where they must navigate through endless spaces while being pursued by nightmarish entities..

name: Project Survival
description: Project Survival is an anime fantasy survival-crafting, monster taming, open world adventure game that you can enjoy solo or with friends. Embark on an epic journey in a thrilling fantasy survival game that will push your skills and instincts to their limits.

name: Pew Pew Crew!
description: Your crew is your currency. Decide carefully which crew members you want to “fire”.

name: Phantom Cell
description: Step into the shoes of a fearless FBI agent on a high-stakes mission to dismantle an insidious ultranationalist cult in this intense third-person shooter, "Phantom Cell."

name: NotificationCat VR
description: NotificationCat VR is a mobile phone message notification sync Utility allows you to forward notification messages from Android or iOS devices to VR Display notification messages such as notification titles, contents, etc. without taking off your VR headset.

name: Novantica
description: Explore the open-world, futuristic city of Novantica in this sci-fi adventure game, traveling back in time, crafting devices, gathering clues, and solving puzzles to untangle the plot behind a mysterious event that has damaged critical systems across the city.

name: Open Hunting XL
description: Open Hunting XL is a hunting simulator focused on creating a customizable experience. Hunt small game with engaging systems tailored to those animals. Go after deer with challenging realistic gameplay or go for a casual day out hunting after tweaking your experience to what you enjoy.

name: Operation Noogy
description: Dive into a rhythmic shooting range adventure where precision meets melody. Unlock diverse firearms, ascend the ranks, and groove to the beats in this captivating casual shooter. Challenge your aim, reward your skill, and immerse yourself in the ultimate aim-and-groove experience!

name: Ooze: The Great and Powerful
description: Ooze: The Great and Powerful - is a puzzle platformer without the ability to jump. In this adventure, you will learn the story of classic monsters who are trying to get along with each other by playing for the Ooze Cube guarding the dungeon.

name: Nini Ninja's Great Escape
description: In this big world a tiny hero comes to save the day, Help Nini Ninja escape the clutches of evil by platforming your way through numerous traps, obstacle and monsters, all while trying to collect the keys to escape the room before the clock runs out, on this modern take on retro platformers.

name: My Legend of Immortal Cultivation
description: Immortal cultivation hanging game, with a rich system, experience the world of immortal cultivation

name: My Father's House
description: My Father's House is a first-person indie survival horror game. The father’s old mansion becomes a maze of nightmares when the secrets of the past are released. Survive, save resources, solve puzzles and stay in the shadows. Ingenuity and tactics are your only way to escape.

name: Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles
