description: Embark on a cosmic journey with "Milky Way Jigsaw Puzzles". Solve puzzles featuring stars, galaxies, and celestial wonders while unlocking Steam Achievements. Dive deep into the universe, learn astronomical facts, and connect with fellow puzzle enthusiasts. Your galactic adventure awaits!

name: Monument Village
description: Monument village is a turn-based pacific medieval city-builder. Optimize the placement of each building to grow your village while fulfilling mandatory resource requests. When you are ready, gather workers and materials and finally build the monument of your dream.

name: Modulor
description: A perma-death action rogue-like FPS, where you get gun modules, create crazy combinations and bulid a unique gun every run to shoot through procedurally generated dungeons and slay bosses.

name: Mithronia: Tower Wars
description: Mithronia Tower War is a tower defense game enriched with rogue-like features. You'll construct towers and utilize abilities tailored to your preferences. Protect the mystical quartet of ancient trees, with each tree representing a sacred element - fire, water, earth, and air - brought to life.

name: Missile Dancer 2
description: Missile Dancer 2 is a new sprite scaler shmup that combines rail shooter and caravan STG.

name: MimiCries
description: Investigate the mysteries of a haunted mansion as you solve various challenging puzzles in this Victorian-inspired, narrative-driven escape room game. With only your wit and a lantern to light the way forward, will the choices you make seal your fate, or open the path to freedom?

name: Midnight at the Disco
description: Annihilate massive hordes of evil alien eyeball monsters as you struggle to survive a full day on the dance floor. Choose from a diverse set of character traits, weapons and upgrades to create unique builds on each run to blast the baddies into oblivion.

name: Micro Rogue
description: Venture into the minimalist gauntlet of Micro Rogue, a 2D top-down action roguelike where your hero auto-attacks. Shape your journey with strategic upgrades, face off against a variety of foes, and see how far you can get. Fun meets strategy in this reinvented dungeon dash!

name: Metal Bringer
description: In this roguelike action-adventure, control humanoid "Labor" and giant "Arms" to uncover the mysteries of the world. Create fully-customizable robots, strengthen them, and take down hordes of enemies!

name: MannaRites Gold
description: Gold edition of the warmly received fantasy 2.5D hack-n-slash / RPG - MannaRites! Cut your way through enemy troops, explore open map, find and equip legendary weapons, armor and artifacts, level up your hero! Defend your lands from invaders!

name: Manhattan Dolls
description: "Manhattan Dolls" is a point-and-click adventure game with RPG and dating sim elements. Play as either a lesbian woman or as a straight man and romance your way around The Big Apple. Meet beautiful women and see what crazy adventures lie in store for you on this epic night about town!

name: Mature Comedy Visual Novel
description: Experience a world filled with awful people - and you're one of them! You embark on a journey to get your awful catgirl girlfriend some illicit materials, intense and prolonged misery immediately ensues.

name: Maid Cafe: Maid Girls Comics
description: New content in the form of comics to collect and read in game, new desserts and new in-game content are added with this DLC. Enjoy the fully uncensored comics within the game at any time as you play via the in-game phone.

name: Maid Cafe: Monstrous Beauties Comics
description: New content in the form of comics to collect and read in game, new desserts and new in-game content are added with this DLC. Enjoy the fully uncensored comics within the game at any time as you play via the in-game phone.

name: UnReaMod
description: Experience Lumina Leap: Leap to the beat of neon through dazzling levels.Master the jumps, shine on the leaderboards.Dive into the light action!

name: Locura
description: Locura is a first-person immersive horror game. It is a thrilling journey into the unknown. Prepare for moral ambiguity where the line between light and darkness blurs.

name: Little Dew Drop
description: Little Dew Drop is a small, relaxing and slow-paced 2D platformer. Enjoy the original soundtrack while travelling through six increasingly challenging levels.

name: Line Time
description: 《Line Time》is a puzzle game based on “controlling the timeline”.

name: Light of Hope: The Redeemer
description: In light of hope, you are tasked with exploring awe inspiring locations, solving ancient puzzles left behind by those who came before. Choose your style, equipped abilities, outfits, weapons and more, as you solve a mystery that only you can reveal.

name: Life Museum
description: A side-scrolling puzzle game in line style. You take on the role of an office worker who, after working day after day, decides to explore the city. Play with keyboard or Xbox controller.

name: Lawin Catch The Kim
description: Lawin Catch The Kim is a fun puzzle game~Chicken Kim never eats and runs wild outside every day. As Kim's good friend, you need to take them all back to the chicken coop and eat obediently! The game is always given 20 levels.Take all Kim home!

name: Kill a Million Rats
description: A roguelite bullet-heaven RTS, set in a forest invaded by an endless horde of Rats. As the Spirit of Vengeance, you must save the adorable, innocent animals. Explore a randomly generated world, harvest resources, rebuild the Hidden Village, recruit allies, and Kill a Million Rats!

name: Jacob's Quest: Voyage
description: The quest continues in Jacob's Quest : Voyage! Join Kaiden and Jacob on their voyage across the sea islands on thier search for legendary treasure. A grim plot unfolds...

name: IronWolf: Free Non-VR Edition
description: This is the Free Non-VR version of IronWolf VR. A co-op submarine game with a light touch on realism, making the submarine sim genre accessible to a wider audience.

name: Jewel Match Atlantis Solitaire 4: Collector's Edition
description: Immerse yourself in the enchanting depths of the mystical underwater realm of Atlantis Solitaire! Delve into numerous intricate underwater levels and build stunning aquatic landscapes. Tackle the latest Supersize, Challenge, and Match-2 levels as you unlock a multitude of new solitaire variations.

name: Jump Malcolm Jump
description: Embark on a jump-filled odyssey in "Jump Malcolm Jump," a 3D platformer that blends arcade excitement with daring dashes. Collect Energy Orbs across stunning worlds and dash past obstacles. Casual fun meets high-flying action!

name: Immune Simulator Type Z
description: In the game "Immune Simulator," the world is losing to zombies. The protagonist finds a computer with historical records of conflicts. Altering data changes the real-world balance, affecting her companions. Is it a divine salvation or devilish trap? Unravel the hidden secrets to find out.

name: Fighting cop
description: “Fighting cop " is an exciting VR shooting game that gives you the experience of becoming a hero of the entire city. In this city, gang criminals are prevalent, and you are a rare sharpshooter in the police community. Your mission is to combat criminals and protect the safety of citizens.

name: Fly Caster VR
description: "Fly Caster VR" immerses you in serene landscapes, casting your rod amidst breathtaking beauty. Experience the art of fly fishing with realistic physics, stunning graphics, and a dynamic ecosystem. Relax, explore, and embark on an unforgettable fishing adventure in virtual reality.

name: Gloomy Village
description: Gloomy Village is an erotic adventure with elements of survival. You are in the role of a big-breasted treasure hunter and adventurer - Evelyn.

name: Flips¿de
description: Flips¿de is an RPG where Sam and her roommates are getting ready to move out of their apartment, but the night before they leave, a mysterious leak leads to a strange world with even stranger people. Can Sam navigate this world, fix the leak, and get her security deposit back?

name: Golf by the Way
description: A fast-paced real-time mini-golf party game with no stroke count! Play as an actual golfer in real-time and go smack your friends’ golf ball or even your friends themselves.

name: Gobs and Gods
description: The tactical RPG going full Goblin mode! Hire a band of almost-heroic goblins to fight and die for you in tactical turn-based battles, accomplish silly quests for the weird inhabitants of this fantastic world, and truly become a god - at least by goblin standards.

name: HoverCraft
description: HoverCraft combines vehicle crafting and base-building. Play solo or team up, create unique hovercrafts, explore a large world for resources, refine them into valuable goods for higher profits, and upgrade your base. Defeat enemies guarding rare resources and keep your base safe!

name: I Am Short
description: It's time to step into their tiny little shoes just to see how hard life can be for someone so short.

name: Hero or Villain: Genesis - Supercharged!
description: Over 40 new powers! Five new side missions to patrol the streets, go skiing with your favorite characters or discover the legacy of vampire hunters!

name: Hoops World
description: Relax and shoot some hoops around the world!

name: Grin Zone: Fun House
description: Step into the Grin Zone Daycare after hours – stay hidden from Grin, the playful yet unusual daycare mascot. Will you find your way out? Discover the secrets within this intriguing adventure.

name: Harem! Ranch Life
description: This is a relaxing farm RPG game where you can earn money by collecting and raising livestock! Interact with adorable villagers to increase your popularity in the village through chatting and giving gifts. Please enjoy a cozy farm life in this small village!

name: Heroes & Redemption
description: Heroes & Redemption is a rogue-lite bullet-hell where you face hordes of enemies, annihilate them, learn new abilities and enhance your skills. Explore different regions, acquire new companions and embark on adventures again and again.

name: Grunenberg
description: "Grunenberg" is a single-player horror game that utilizes the visual and sound design of VHS tapes. The protagonist, Jimmy Solomon, comes to the abandoned area named Grunenberg to find his grandfather and captures everything he sees on the camera as his grandfather's request.

name: Envoy
description: You have been created by a mysterious monolith with a single goal: to retrieve five force crystals back to it as quickly as possible. Deal with the plights of space physics, evade the locals, and complete your mission as soon as possible.

name: Enigmatic Worlds
description: Explore strange and abstract worlds filled with equally unusual but deadly beings of many types. Enigmatic Worlds is an FPS inspired by obscure retro-styled FPS games and Amiga games.

name: Duckball
description: Duckball is an action-packed battle royale game where up to 100 players compete to be the last duck standing. Play with friends online and collect wacky items to knock your opponents off the stage in an ever changing 3D environment. Do you have what it takes to be truly glorious?

name: Dualis
description: Dualis is a sci-fi horror thriller whose story takes you to an underground research complex. You will have to fight not only for your life, but also to understand if you really exist. What is consciousness and personality are the questions you will have to ask yourself.

name: DropingBalls
description: This is a simple casual game for avoiding falling balls. You can move the protagonist through AWSD to exercise your reaction and planning abilities while resting. It comes with a maximum survival time recording mechanism.

name: Drift Abyss
description: Drift Abyss is a VR experience where you can fly with your arms, climb with your fists, and discover unique landscapes in this procedurally generated planet.

name: Fate of Aruna
description: A science fiction and high fantasy role playing game which takes place amid the ruins of a shattered planet.

name: Fate and Life: The Mystery of Vaulinhorn
description: Fate and Life: The Mystery of Vaulinhorn is a visual novel game set in an enigmatic city rife with mystery and lust. Navigate the intertwining paths of fate and desire, unearth the haunting secrets of Vaulinhorn, and revel in the thrill of its sensual encounters.

name: Farther Forest
description: Farther forest - is a 2D platform game with RPG elements. Kill different enemies with your weapons! Complete different tasks and deal with the monsters that stand in your way, and beware of deadly traps.

name: Exodus
description: Save Moses' girlfriend from the clutches of the prince of Egypt, Ramses, in this thrilling adventure across the Egyptian desert. Face enemies and bosses, find items and power-ups scattered throughout a fantastic 2D open world full of challenges, secrets and much more!

name: Evotactics
description: Evotactics is a tactical third person shooter with extremely destructible environments and an emphasis on stealth. Knock out lights, destroy walls, infiltrate, and complete objectives across multiple environments.

name: Evelynn
description: "Evelynn" is an adventure game that tells the story of two little girls, Lynn and Eve, on a travel adventure in an incredible amusement park. With the company and hard work of the two, can they successfully leave this unknown amusement park...

name: Estate Agent Simulator
description: Estate Agent Simulator lets you enter the exciting world of the real estate market. You can buy, decorate, advertise, rent or sell houses. You can buy vacant land and build houses. Environmental factors will affect the rental prices of houses.

name: Escape Escape
description: You awaken in a mysterious room and promptly clear items from the desk. The individual behind this watches in surprise on the monitor. "Hey! What are you doing? Let me play my game!" "Escape Escape" is an adventure where you explore, interact, and advance through maps and characters.

name: Eon Rush
description: Eon Rush - a real-time action RPG that combines the best of endgame PvE and PvP thrills, skipping the filler and getting straight into the fun. Players dive into a variety of trials, including taking down colossal monsters, competing in challenging gauntlets, and engaging in heart-pounding battles.

name: DMVR
description: I taught myself how to drive by making this game.

name: Draco and the Seven Scales
description: Discover the mysteries of the great ocean in Draco and The Seven Scales! Explore dungeons, collect items, and fight scallywags on land and on the seven seas.

name: Cute Survivors The Musical
description: A musical rogue-like adventure where you lead a band of adorable cats. Feel the rhythm-based abilities to unlock new band members, levels, and songs. Each member brings unique instruments and abilities, allowing you to overcome the hordes of enemies with the power of music!

name: Dark Age
description: Dark Age is a futuristic 3D action game with refined low poly design. Enjoy this frenetic Beat 'em up.

name: Delicards: A Delicious Card Game
description: Imagine being a chef at a restaurant, but instead of enduring the heat of the kitchen, you're using trading cards portraying recipes, ingredients, seeds and special cards. Compete, Earn, Grow and Collect cards from all over the world and become #1 Kard Chef.

name: Descentia
description: We fused card games and open-world rpg together to make the best single player open world deckbuilder we could. Build your party with different races, craft a unique deck, encounter bizarre creatures, complete the quests and get ready for a breathtaking adventure

name: Das Geheimnis von Lakeshore
description: A 2D Point and Click Adventure in Pixel Art

name: Ctrl+Alt+Destroy
description: The year 2000 is right around the corner. Do you think your CPU can survive Y2K?

name: Crowned Control
description: A couch co-op multiplayer game, where the goal is to grab the crown and keep it on your head for as long as possible to win the game!

name: Crimson Crisis
description: Embrace the chaos… Battle aliens, shoot guns and, above all else, survive to work anotherday in Crimson Crisis, a sci-fi action-roguelite set in a post-apocalyptic universe.

name: Cozy Fishing
description: Cozy Fishing is a game where you can chill and fish to grow your aquarium fish collection in chilling environments and a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Cosmorists
description: Explore, and exploit your surroundings to advance! Unlock crafting recipes in a tech tree via research, and crafting science. Explore the surface, or deep in the caves, and protecting yourself against the elements in dangerous areas, or relaxing in safe areas!

name: Conge's Crunch Time
description: Take over the kingdom through programming. An octopus named Queue and a toad named Stack will be with you. As long as you give them the right instructions.

name: Creature Battle Simulator
description: Forge an army of creatures to defeat your opponents in epic battles across distant lands! Duel against your friends online, or conquer the campaign to unlock new parts that upgrade your creatures' stats and abilities. Will you emerge victorious?

name: Bounty Hunters
description: Fight in a top down 2d shooter adventure with resource gathering / bullet heaven/hell mechanics.

name: Blue Ridge Hunting
description: Blue Ridge Hunting is a horror game where you and up to 2 friends investigate, document, and hunt cryptids in the Appalachian Mountains of eastern America. Based on real sightings, phenomena, and legends from the region.

name: Broken Life
description: Broken Life is a 2D point-and-click adventure that explores deep emotions caused by war. You will shape the story with your decisions, solve puzzles and discover various secrets. Broken Life is a solo project inspired by real experiences of living through war.

name: Brews & Bastards
description: Brews & Bastards is a chaotic co-op dungeon crawler for 1-4 players, overflowing with action-packed combat, magical brews and outlandish tavern games. Select from a group of distinct heroes and blast your way through hordes of drunken demons in search of the stolen Brew Stone.

name: Bright Side: Riddles & Puzzles
description: Who is lying? Who will survive? Which way is safe? Watch unusual stories and solve tricky riddles with your friends or solo!

name: Bunny's Pizza Tycoon
description: Open and customize an old restaurant! Inspired by the fnaf series, you play the role of a company owner during the day and a worker during the night. Buy Items during the day and maybe make a little bonus cash during the nights so you can make money the next day!

name: Bunny Bond
description: Bunny Bond is a steamy visual novel where you can chat, flirt, and fall in love with 6 handsome guys! Enjoy fun interactions with the group, send DMs to whoever catches your eye, and collect all of the sexy pictures they send to you!

name: Bump and Run Racing
description: Get ready to tear up the streets and smash your way to the finish line! Bump & Run Racing is an ode to classic arcade racers where crashing opponents is not only allowed, but encouraged.

name: Buhei
description: Dive into our action-packed Twin Stick Party Shooter! Grab your friends and engage in explosive multiplayer battles, whether you're playing right next to them on the couch or from a distance.

name: Coke Bugs
description: A hallucinatory bender of a late night road trip sketched in nervous lines of arcade action and exploration.

name: Chaos Crafters
description: Learn, craft and test spells on any element of the game! Solve puzzles or fight enemies alone or in co-op. Be careful, your friends are not immune to your magic and one wrong move could cause total chaos.

name: Campfire Stories : Episode 1
description: Embark on an enchanting narrative-driven adventure across two worlds. Explore, solve puzzles, and save your family in this mild action platformer. Vibrant visuals inspired by classic cartoons.

name: Cadde
description: Are you ready to let it rip in the streets of İstanbul? Cadde combines fun physics, realistic sound design and the atmospheric air of İstanbul.

name: C.I.E.B The Backrooms Project
description: Prepare. Explore. Survive. Extract. Profit. You will explore the infinite backrooms and bring back proof of your journey. In return I will allow you to browse a catalog so our scientist can increase your odds at survival. You will have to cover some expenses like body upkeep and so forth. Good Luck.

name: Age of Goblins
description: Conquer caves, farms and towers to expand your might and raise your tribe of goblins to the heights it deserves. Age of Goblins is a real-time strategy (RTS) game with simplified mechanics where your goal is to dominate the entire map and subdue your rival tribes.

name: Adventure Story
description: Play the role of the Adventure Guild President of the Magic World. Manage and utilize every resource at hand. Dig out legendary stories from various regions and spread your guild name throughout the entire empire. Finally, obtain powerful artifacts hidden around the world.

name: Abyss
description: Abyss Online is an immersive MMORPG set in the mystical world of Aeternea. Engage in epic quests, intense combat, and shape your destiny. Customize your character with powerful weapons and armors. Explore diverse landscapes and uncover hidden secrets. Experience a captivating online adventure.

name: Blood, Fuel, Ammo & Speed
description: Blood, Fuel, Ammo & Speed is a Fast Paced Rogue-lite Action Fps Game. Pour Out Fuel and Ammo and Dance In Blood With Speed. KILL THE DEMONS.

name: BloodFlood
description: BloodFlood is a 2D Action-Platformer where you battle your way through a deadly infestation. Explore to uncover hidden secrets and grow to become the perfect killing machine.

name: Block_Up
description: An action-packed two-player local-coop 2D puzzle platformer with a focus on teamwork. Use one player's ability to place blocks and the other's ability to break them to create a path to your goal while escaping the rising lava from below!

name: Beyond Hanwell
description: Step into Hanwell and discover a world beyond it. Set in the deeper parts of London, explore Westminster and uncover the truth about the enigmatic stranger known as The Director. Fight with whatever you can find or use the environment to take out Anomolies.

name: Bertie the Stableboy
description: Help Bertie the stableboy find his way out of difficult situations he unwittingly started in this modern take on the adventure game genre. There are many paths to success, making each playthrough unique. Help Bertie on his journey to becoming the hero of the kingdom, whether he wants to or not.

name: Beasts of Steel
description: Beasts of Steel is a semi-realistic WWII game that combines FPS and Strategy where you can battle solo or online. Experience intense combat as an infantryman, tank crew, or take to the skies as a pilot. Unleash chaos and dominate the battlefield!

name: Bancroft Academy
description: "Bancroft Academy" plunges you into the vibrant and unpredictable world of college life, with an enchanting twist. In this adult visual novel, every choice you make shapes the narrative, leading you down thrilling paths of romance, mystery, and magic.

name: Athos
description: Welcome to a captivating journey into the world of Athos. Build a formidable base to protect yourself from the wild and unpredictable environment, and master the art of taming mighty dinosaurs to be your loyal companions. Welcome to a world where survival is not just a choice but a way of life!

name: Beat Rush
description:
Unlock unique characters for more fun, and level up for more challenges!
Beat Rush is your new addiction! With this brand new beat-based action platform game, you will challenge your skills and see what you’re capable of.
The gameplay is as simple as one touch jumps and hops. You just need to rush forward in tune with the amazing beats the game offers. Dance your fingers to the adventurously good music.

name: Meow Meoww
description: Help the cat find more fish.

name: 125 Balls
description: "125 Balls" is a 3D arcade and puzzle game. It is mini, beautiful and addictive. Easy to learn: shoot balls to the planet while don't hit other balls. Hard to master: it is from developer of "99.99%" and it is only for torturing yourself! Can you challenge 125 balls?

name: Continuum 01
description:
Continuum - Try to navigate through an endless and immersive combination of color, geometry, and music.
Continuum is a lightweight and simple game where you move around in different directions to avoid swarms of never-ending obstacles that fly right towards you. The game requires focus and fast-reaction, test and see how far you can journey into the continuum.

name: Color DJ
description:
Visually ever changing fast action music game with a retro style that is easy on the eyes.
Align notes perfectly, rack up combos and beat your friends at the leaderboard!
Three levels of difficulty, to really test your skills!

name: Kiss Rock City: Be A Rockstar
description: Who doesn’t want to be a rock star? There’s only one problem: you don’t have enough money and you clash with your band over every decision. Just about to give up, you meet the super famous and glorious band members of KISS. What follows is a stardom adventure to form the next best rockband – and Kiss offers to help you!

name: Andromeda Overdrive
description: Reach for the stars and high scores in 80s retro inspired synthwave infused endless arcade!

name: Simple Monster Hunter
description: Beat powerful monsters. Step by step to become a hunter. Beat monsters to get the materials, forging super equipment by materials. More than 100 items to explore and forging.

name: Hexuma
description: Hexuma is an exciting puzzle game for iPhone and iPad. Start exercising your brain today ! This is how it is played: start at the green tile and select connecting tiles to construct a calculation and it's outcome. Finish with the red tile and make sure the calculation and it's outcome are correct. Earn bonus points for finishing the game within the bonus time. If you are stuck, use a hint.

name: Tappy Dig: Virtual Pet Fox Game
description:
Tappy is about to go on an underground expedition and needs your help to guide him through the depths of Earth. Many mysteries await Tappy in this fun and exciting adventure. Download Tappy Dig now and start exploring!
As you explore, be sure to collect as much fruit as you can. Also beware of snakes, bats and ghosts. They want to ruin your expedition! But don't worry, you can count with amazing power ups to help you get through any trouble!

name: Conde
description:
Imagine connecting source to the receiver using only 3 blocks - is that so simple? Not at all. Check your creativity with this simple, clear but demanding puzzle game.
Try solving all 42 uniquely designed levels and become convinced that Conde is a brilliant puzzle game which scales incredibly well.

name: Math Be Nimble: Brain Training
description:
You can keep your brain sharp no matter what age or math level you are - with Math Be Nimble! It is great brain exercise and helps you get quicker, faster, and stronger with math. Elevate the mind!
Choose your color and quickly solve problems to earn awards and reach goals while improving your mathematical skill and your cognitive focus and attention. Includes addition, subtraction, multiplication, division, order of operations, sequences, basic algebra, and more!
Math Be Nimble makes math fun and allows players of all levels to practice core mathematics skills - playing a few quiz rounds a day will help you learn to think quickly with math and increase your problem solving ability.
This brain game is challenging, but you can do it! Strengthen your core math skills, starting now!
So what are you waiting for? Download Math Be Nimble today and start improving your math skills one color at a time! Great math practice for Kids AND Adults ñ it is for everyone! Play together and help each other excel at math.
Teachers, students, homeschool - give this quiz game a try. You will be impressed with how well this math game works. 3rd grade math, 4th grade math, 5th grade math and up - Junior High Math or Middle School Math, even High School math students will benefit from the unique combination of quick calculations and mental problem solving. More real math progress in just fractions of the time! Perfect STEM and MESA resource - a focused learning tool.
Get mentally fit and focused with the arithmetic and algebra basics. The fast thinking in this brain game is excellent training for all testing and exam prep, including standardized math tests and homeschool equivalency tests.
Increase your speed, attention, and focus, while helping to elevate the mind skills needed to succeed in more difficult material like algebra, calculus, physics, etc - all are based on these core math basics!

name: Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend
description: Play the overwhelming 'Demigod Idle: Rise of a legend' and unleash your divine and dark powers! You are the mighty Demigod, who possesses both the power of angels and demons. You, who had all your powers taken away by the Archangel Michael and the Archdemon Lucifer while trying to conquer the heavens... Now, regain your angelic and demonic powers and embark on your revenge..!

name: Rocket Cars
description:
The creators of Touchgrind Skate2, Touchgrind BMX and Mr. Crab now bring you the breathtaking and extremely addictive car racing game Rocket Cars.
Strap in and rocket through the offroad Desert tracks, boost through the picturesque Wooden landscape and then blow your opponents away in the challenging Copper world. Upgrade your cars and compete against increasingly difficult ai cars in 60+ levels and prove that you have what it takes to win.

name: 3D Knife
description: "3D Knife" is a 3D arcade to test your reflex and patience. It is mini, beautiful and addictive.Lots of knives can be unlocked. Easy to learn: shoot knife to the wood planet while don't hit other knives. Hard to master: you should take the right chance!

name: Creep Shock
description: Tap to jump the creep. Time jumps to just right. Avoid falling into the void.

name: Desert Rush
description: Each mode offers hours of gameplay and free entertainment for you and your friends.

name: Kyub Crazy Colors
description:
Crazy Colors is an endurance based rhythmic game. Tap colors to ascend the spire. How many steps can you reach? Challenge your friends, record your games and share your big plays ! Fulfill the swag bar with good inputs for some easy time. At the opposite, too many bad inputs and the boss gets closer to you. Be careful !
4 difficulty levels for everyone ! Will you dare the impossible mode?

name: Cracked
description: Frustratingly difficult egg-centric physics-based 3D platforming obstacle course. Try to make it to the end without getting cracked.

name: Cook-A-Geddon
description: Jump into a quirky action-adventure set in a stylized and food-themed fantasy world. Switch between three chefs and use your skills to fight against the mighty grease titan and his minions.Fast-paced action combat, odd characters and plenty of puns await you.

name: Maid Cafe
description: Meet over 30 cute girls and win their hearts. Experience sexy sequences. Become the best pastry chef at a bake-off competition. Use your tips to take girls out on dates. Make your own choices at the Maid Cafe!

name: Devastated Path
description: The life of an ordinary freelance programmer Romero, whose existence is swallowed up by darkness. Not the fairy tail, but a dark part of humanity.

name: Gelluloid Domination: SpaceLab Simulator
description: Run a spaceship's lab module all by yourself while trying to find a cure for close-to-extinct humanity. Make repairs to various systems of the ship, solve technical problems, perform maintenance, and upgrade tools that will help you to overcome the most unusual challenges.

name: Isekai'd
description: Be transported into a fantasy world with your friends in this open-world multiplayer RPG. Complete quests where your choices shape the outcome, defeat bosses, explore dungeons, and claim castles for your own guild.

name: Naruto to Boruto: Shinobi Striker - Master Character Training Pack: Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode)
description: A special training pack for your avatar! Get Naruto Uzumaki (Baryon Mode) as a master in this Master Character Training Pack!

name: Melvin's Blocky Adventure
description: A block-pushing puzzle game set in a water-filled world. Push to the blocks to advance to the next puzzle.

name: Honey's Sweet Revenge
description: Honey's Sweet Revenge is a metroidvania with mechanics inspired by platform fighters. Customize your item loadout and defeat enemies and bosses.

name: PsionicAwake Playtest
description: Sin descripción

name: Shadow of Murders
description: Shadow of Murders is a murder-solving game.Help solve the FBI's unsolvable murders with Psychiatrist Joseph. People and situations are not normal. Make people talk. Gather evidence. Find the killer and inform the FBI.

name: 3am in Leicester
description: Walk the streets of Leicester City and collect food. Become sober. Stay alert. There are ghosts. Made with the Godot Engine.

name: Crystal Ball Critters
description: Crystal Ball Critters is a multiplayer ball-racing game, in which you race your friends through our antagonist's carefully thought out multiverse of adventures! Play by yourself or against up to 4 of your friends to find out who can beat each stage first.

name: Stations in Seoul: Open World Card RPG
description: Immerse yourself in the captivating universe of our enthralling prequel to Find with Seoul. This game beautifully weaves together the exciting elements of a card game RPG with a fascinating narrative that propels you on a quest for continuous development.

name: Town Squared
description: Town Squared is a peaceful city building and puzzle game. Create cute architecture as you take a tiny voyage, discovering and unlocking new buildings along the way.

name: In the Same Boat
description: Embark on an adventure across the ocean! In this captivating cooperative sailing game, one player commands the ship, while the other is confined to the captain's cabin, solely navigating with the map. Successfully delivering goods on time will demand the crew's adept communication and skill.

name: The Keeper's Book
description: Join a young hero in his journey through a magical world filled with wonders and perils, and help him reveal the mystery that lies between the pages of the Keeper’s Book. Explore, craft and fight in this brand new indie adventure.

name: Background Memory
description: A playable music video featuring Hatsune Miku. Second in the series.

name: Red Lightning
description: A retro style, 2D top-down action/adventure game in the vein of NES archetypes. Couch style local co-op or solo.

name: Atelier Ryza 3: Recipe Expansion Pack - Art of Adventure
description: Gain the upper hand in combat with new recipes! Adds new item recipes that can be used in combat. Also adds new ingredients associated with the (Core Ingredients) category that can be gathered from various areas.
